text: usamen spasht nishaaniyaan hai, vah ibaraaheem ka sthal hai. aur jisane usamen pravesh kiya, vah nishchint ho gaya. logon par allaah ka haq hai ki jisako vahaan tak pahunchane kee saamarthy praapt ho, vah is ghar ka haj kare, aur jisane inakaar kiya to (is inakaar se allaah ka kuchh nahin bigadata) allaah to saare sansaar se nirapeksh hai.
